abstract.p: Mary Lou Dinardo letter on Anne Jarrell's July 2 article on doctors who love publicity holds true publicists are information brokers0

block.p: ''Doctors Who Love Publicity'' is full of thinly veiled disparagements of publicists. True publicists are essentially ''information brokers.'' The media frequently contacts us -- yes, mere publicists -- for assistance in identifying experts and sources. As someone who has worked both sides -- as a journalist and publicist -- I can say that it is a mutually beneficial relationship. The medical profession is unfortunately like any other business these days, and publicity has been proven to generate patients and cash flow.
